title: Alesha Dixon catches the eye in a peacock print shirt dress at America's Got Talent filming
text:
She said she felt like the 'luckiest girl on the planet' as she shared the first photo of her seven-week-old daughter Anaya earlier this week.

And Alesha Dixon looked positively glowing as she headed for another day of filming America's Got Talent: The Champions alongside Simon Cowell and Heidi Klum in Los Angeles on Thursday.

The singer, 41, dressed her incredible post-baby figure in a peacock print shift dress, which made the most of her tremendous pins.

Styling her long brunette locks in a sleek straight look, Alesha teamed her shirt dress with pink trainers and Matrix-inspired sunglasses.

Alesha appeared in high spirits as she arrived at the Pasadena Auditorium with her husband Azuka, who looked dapper in a purple suit.

The singer is currently filming as a judge for America's Got Talent: The Champions, after replacing Mel B on the panel, after giving birth seven weeks ago.

New addition: Earlier this week, Alesha confirmed she and husband Azuka had welcomed their second child, a daughter named Anaya Safiya, with a post on Instagram

On Tuesday, Alesha confirmed they had welcomed their second child with an Instagram post of their baby daughter Anaya Safiya.

She wrote: 'Anaya Safiya born 20.08.19. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet.'

Alesha confirmed she was expecting her second child with Azuka in May, during an appearance on Britain’s Got Talent.

Taking to the stage during the first live show of the series, Alesha revealed her prominent baby bump in a form-fitting dress.

Her announcement was pre-empted by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly, who referenced to her pregnancy in a Morcambe and Wise style opening skit.

Alesha later admitted she was ecstatic to be expecting her second child with her husband.

Doting mother: The star told fans she felt like 'the luckiest girl on the planet' as she doted over her newborn

Sweet: Alesha appeared in high spirits as she arrived at the Pasadena Auditorium with her husband Azuka, who looked dapper in a purple suit

'It's a lovely place to celebrate it,' she said, gesturing to the audience gathered inside London's Hammersmith Apollo.

Alesha had previously confessed she felt "so much more relaxed" in her second pregnancy.

She said: 'I feel great actually, I feel so much more relaxed this time around. It's great the first time around you read every single book going and the second time you're like, "I've got this."

'Azura is amazing, she's doing really well and kisses me every day and making sure everything's okay. She's so excited, beyond excited.'
